alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:04PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hamilton and northwestern Kearny Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT/1100 PM MDT/... At 1104 PM CDT/1004 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Syracuse, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Syracuse around 1015 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kendall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
